살인마협회장님 보고 시작하게 되었고 정말 재미있게 즐기고 있습니다. 
1vs4라는 비대칭적인 pvp게임이라는 점에서 굉장히 신박해요 
그런데 게임은 다 재미있는데 너무 많아서 이제는 익숙해진 버그와 맞지 않는 밸런스. 
그걸 맞춘다고 하며 버프했어야할 부분은 다 너프해버리고 
업데이트마다 새롭게 생기는 버그가 굉장히 피곤하게 하네요.
개발사 쪽에서 정작 자기들 게임에 대해서 너무 모르는 것 같습니다 
좀더 게임을 직접 플레이해보고 연구한 뒤에 밸런스를 좀더 조심스럽게 조정 했으면 좋겠네요. 
이번 루인 너프 같은 경우를 말하자면
그동안 생존자들이 발전기를 돌리는 속도는 특히 한국서버에서 매우 빨라서 루인같은 발전기를 견제하는 퍽을 사용하지 않으면 살인마가 아무것도 하지 못한 상태로 게임이 끝나 버릴 수 있을 정도였고 앞으로도 그럴 것입니다.
루인이라는 퍽은  살인마 입장에서는 자신의 4개의 칸에 넣고 싶지 않아도 넣어야만 밸런스가 조금이라도 맞을 정도 입니다. 즉 루인은 살인마와 생존자 사이의 밸런스를 맞출수 있는 중요한 퍽이었던 것입니다. 그리고 생존자 입장에서 생각해봐도 루인이 있는 발전기를 돌리는 것은 물론 처음에 어렵지만 어느정도 플레이를 하고 나면 충분히 간단하게 해결할 수 있는 문제입니다. 오히려 그정도의 난이도는 초보자들에게 적당한 진입장벽을 제공하고 있었다고 볼 수 있죠.
 이번 루인너프는 신규생존자들의 진입장벽을 좀더 낮춤으로써 게임에 유저들을 모으는 역할을 하기위해 실행되었다고 보입니다. 신규유저들을 모으는 것 또한 물론 당연하고 좋은 일이지만 기존 재미있게 플레이하던 유저들 입장에서는 밸런스를 망치는 패치입니다.
현 개발진은 자신의 게임이 어떠한 밸런스를 가지고 있는지 잘 인지하고 있지 못한 것 같습니다
그리고 개발진은 가장 크고 영향력 있는 서버입장에서만 생각하고 있는 것 같습니다.
한국 서버에서 플레이하고 있는 유저 입장에서 이것은 개발진이 돈이 더 되는 쪽으로만 생각하고 있다고 보입니다.
이러한 태도는 주류 서버 이외에 많은 유저들을 떠나보낼 수 있다는 것을 인지 하셨으면 좋겠습니다.

Hodně Super hra , Lehká na pochopení ,ale přitom dává hodně možností jak ji hrát. Doporučuji Všem. <3
Přeživší : Snaží se utéct Vrahovi za pomocí opravování Generátorů a vzájemné kooperace + perků. Každá postava má své univerzální Perky ,ale některé se však shodují a od lvlu 50 si můžete na postavu dát perk od jiné postavy. 
Vrah : Snaží se zabít 4 přeživší za pomocí Primárního útoku + perků. Každý vrah má jiné perky.
Utečte pomocí brány nebo jako poslední přeživší pomocí poklopu ,který se spawne někde na mapě. 
Čím víc hodin tím jste lepší hráč. A to je Dead by Daylight.

отличная игра для веселого время провождения. Достатки: захватывает дух при полном погружении в атмосферу. хорошо продуманые персонажи - каждый уникален в своем направлении. не сильно требовательная для железа. Недостатки: долгое ожидание в лобби. рандомный набор лобби - бывает кидает слабым персом к очень сильным противникам. Но все же ставлю 9 из 10. друзьям рекомендовал и рекомендую. темболее вместе веселей.
Esta muy bien, a mi me engancho muchisimo y sigo enganchado a mi me divierte bastante yo lo recomando sinceramente

This game saved my life.

I am 27.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ing minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.

After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

The game is becoming stale, I've played on and off both Pc and Console. There's nothing new from one year ago to make you go wow this is great, it's just the same thing, patches break more than they fix and the new killers they add are either to strong in a good players hands (Which let's be honest once the community cry's enough nerf's happen)  or there just plain trash out the gate.
Great art team.  Worst balance team in the world.

Siguen nerfeando a los asesinos una y otra vez pero los supervivientes solo se siguen haciendo más tóxicos y pesados, tienen demasiadas ventajas y muy poco que perder, el juego es increible y ninguno otro lo hace como este, pero necesita un poco de balance para atraer a más personas y mantener a las que ya tiene, es un juego en el que los asesinos deberían provocar terror y los supervivientes deberían esconderse de ellos, no hacer tea bag y golpear al asesino con todo lo que tiene el mapa.

The game is survivor favored dont get me wrong its fun to play with friends and having custom matches are so much fun but being a solo que is not very fun and being a killer is bipolar fun but goddamn with the Ruin nerf coming GOOD LUCK BEING A KILLER LMAO the gens are done way too fast if they werent maybe Ruin wouldnt have been so essential for most if not ALL killers im a killer main  but i put my fair share of time playing survivor but i do feel like killers need some love its gonna be hard to play clown or pig without Ruin so feels bad man dont reccommend the game if you play it for just being a killer bcs your gonna get cheesed ALOT

This will be an honest review at almost 900 hours. This game sucks half the time I will be honest. A great game dont get me wrong just so many things wrong with the player community and sweat players. Honestly if you have (a) friend(s) who play this game you should get it to play with them. Tip DO NOT get into red ranks or else you will hate this game. Besides that youll have fun with your friends! Also you better nominate this game (2020) OR ELSE!

全体的に楽しいです
まだ初めて一か月しかたっていませんがとても楽しめています。
能力解放する楽しさや育てることへの面白さ、またゲームの内容的にもスリルはもちろん戦略や動きなども要求されるのでそれもまた楽しみの一つでもあります。純粋に楽しむ分にはいいと思います
一つだけ気に入らない点は回線を故意に切断するプレイヤーがいることです。ペナルティはつくもののいまだに一定数いるな、といった印象です。ただとっても楽しいゲームには変わりないのでぜひ買ってみてください～
